name: @f8n/f8n-contracts
description: Contract, types, and subgraph for foundation

scripts.test: graph test collection && graph test account
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/fnd-goerli && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/f8n-goerli && graph deploy FoundationContract --debug --ipfs https://graph--foundation-goerli-ipfs.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY --node https://graph--foundation-goerli-admin.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/fnd && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/f8n-mainnet && graph deploy FoundationContract --debug --ipfs https://graph--foundation-mainnet-ipfs.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY --node https://graph--foundation-mainnet-admin.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY
scripts.deploy:mainnet:studio: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build && graph deploy --studio foundation
scripts.deploy:mainnet:figment: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build && graph deploy FoundationContract --debug --ipfs https://graph--foundation-mainnet-ipfs.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY --node https://graph--foundation-mainnet-admin.datahub.figment.io/apikey/$FIGMENT_API_KEY
scripts.deploy:qa:goerli: yarn prepare:goerli && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/qa-goerli
scripts.deploy:qa:mainnet: yarn prepare:mainnet && yarn build && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ f8n/qa
